analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MoldCoinBonus.buyWithBonus (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#344-371):
	External calls:
	- tokens = safeMul(msg.value,fundAddress.price(block.timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#348-349)
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#356-358)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#356-358)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#366-368)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#361-365)

MoldCoin.price (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#196-210) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeInSeconds <= firstStageDatetime (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#197-202)
	- timeInSeconds <= secondStageDatetime (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#202-204)
	- timeInSeconds <= endDatetime (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#205-208)
	- timeInSeconds < startDatetime (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#196-197)

MoldCoin.buyRecipient (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#220-240) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#225-226)

MoldCoin.allocateFounderTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#241-254) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#242-244)

MoldCoin.arrangeUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#287-309) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#291-294)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#289)
	- require(bool)(balances[holder] > 0) (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#298)

MoldCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#136)
MoldCoin.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#135)
MoldCoin.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#136)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#1): it allows old versions

Low level call in MoldCoin.buyRecipient (/unique_chucks/6/0x428c57de1a1d519e953334553b1cc7ef3216e0db.sol#220-240):
